body:
#41 Trace logs cannot be put in order once sorted on column
#42 Pattern matching broken for code reloads

ctrl+shift+t shortcut in the module/function filter to apply traces to all unfiltered functions.

name: 0.6.6 Crash Report Browsing
body:
#38 Crash Report Browsing

![erlyberly-crash-reports](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/213455/9832388/6159bbaa-5971-11e5-9026-a54a46d195d5.png)
#13 ctrl+f shortcut to iterate focus through the filter fields.

Display traces in a table.

#33 fixes confusing tree icons.

**UPDATED:** Changed the release artefact to the standalone, runnable jar. Previously the release had the erlyberly project jar and was not runnable in isolation.

Fixed a bug where traces on recursive functions were coming out backwards!

Timestamps in microseconds for time spent in functions

Copy/Delete traces

Trace all exported functions in a module.

Features of note:
- View source code and abstract code.
- View a functions call graph
#10 Trace all functions displayed under a module

Bug fixes around reconnects.

A usable display for seq_trace traces.

Highlighting for record and record field names in process state.

More compact display of terms in the term tree.

Added a pie chart to visualise memory usage in the VM.

![erlang_memory](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/213455/7621235/185a3880-f9bd-11e4-8640-13c92d1365c2.png)
Show record  and record name field names when displaying process state.
Seq trace support in the UI, still experimental.
Get the state for OTP compliant processes.

Most inter-node calls now do not use the UI thread so less UI freezing.

Fixed an if statement that prevented the connection alive checking thread from running.

Some minor UI changes.

- Support for R17 maps. Traces with maps would previously be dropped, with an exception.
- Fixed an NullPointerException that could cause traces not to be shown
- Other minor fixes and improvements
Correctly show if a function is traced after a module refresh.
Filter all the things.
Allowed the processes and modules to be fully hide-able.
Minor but satisfying fixes.

- Style function calls that have not completed yet
- Fixed NPE when click functions that have not completed yet
- Show incoming results in an already opened term viewer
- Added an alive checker, so user actions do not discover the node is down
Traces are reapplied when the target node restarts

- Do not drop traces when a function is called concurrently
- Show and highlight traced function calls that threw exceptions
- Reload the module tree, like, whenever....
Trace functions that throw exceptions
Robustness fixes.

erlyberly, now with tracing for multiple functions.

![you cannot see the beautiful screen shot](doc/erlyberly.png)

name: 0.0.5 Function filter
body: Function filter
Includes a tree based term browser for trace args and results.

name: 0.0.3 module filters
body: Now with a module filter.

erlyberlys first and mostly usable release with dbg tracing.

Make sure you have java 8 installed. This jar is runnable so double click it or run java -jar erlyberly-0.0.1-runnable.jar in the terminal.

Let me know how you get on @andytill, or @andy_till on twitter.

First release of erlyberly, the dbg UI.  

Make sure you have java 8 installed.  This jar is runnable so double click it or run `java -jar erlyberly-0.0.1-runnable.jar` in the terminal.

Let me know how you get on @andytill, or @andy_till on twitter.
